text:
Looking at this historical German letter, I can identify the following information:

```json
{
    "letter_title": ["null"],
    "send_date": ["1936-09-09"],
    "sender_persons": ["null"],
    "receiver_persons": ["Basler Rheinschiffahrtsaktiengesellschaft Direktion"]
```

The letter is dated "Basel, den 9. September 1936" and is addressed to "Basler Rheinschiffahrtsaktiengesellschaft Direktion" (Basel Rhine Shipping Corporation Direction) in Basel, Marktgasse 5. The letter does not contain a specific title, and while it ends with "In Hochachtung" (With high regard), there is no visible signature or sender name in this image.
